faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How can I get started with Habitify?
faq.answer1: Getting started is easy! Simply download the Habitify app from the App Store and create an account. You can start adding habits and tracking your progress right away.
faq.question2: Can I sync my data across multiple devices?
faq.answer2: Currently, Habitify does not support data synchronization across devices. All your data is stored locally on your device for your privacy and security.
faq.answer3: If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to email us at {{email}}.
